bio.p: Shep Barge, PhD, is an analyst and team leader in the Office of the Secretary of Defense (OSD) focusing on assessment and decision support to improve joint training. Connect with him on milSuite and DoDTechSpace.

Adam Robbins, an associate with Booz Allen Hamilton, currently provides business analytics and project management support for the Office of the Secretary of Defense (OSD). Mr. Robbins graduated from the United States Naval Academy and is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP).

Erecca Simpson, an associate and senior systems engineer at Booz Allen Hamilton, currently provides analyst and knowledge management support for the Office of the Secretary of Defense (OSD). Mrs. Simpson graduated from Villanova University with a BS in mathematics and from the University of Virginia with an MS in systems engineering. She is also a Certified Knowledge Manager (CKM).
